Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are highly promising energy conversion devices.
Titulo: Recent progress in design and fabrication of SOFC cathodes for efficient catalytic oxygen reduction

Sentencas: However, the performance and efficiency of current SOFC devices are still limited by inadequate oxygen reduction activity in the cathode, which has been recognized as a great challenge for SOFCs to achieve high power output at low operating temperatures.
Titulo: Recent progress in design and fabrication of SOFC cathodes for efficient catalytic oxygen reduction

Sentencas: This has stimulated intensive efforts to develop more efficient cathodes for enhanced catalytic oxygen reduction.
Titulo: Recent progress in design and fabrication of SOFC cathodes for efficient catalytic oxygen reduction

Sentencas: This article reviews recent advances in design and fabrication of cathodes for efficient SOFCs, with emphasis on (1) engineering cathode microstructures, (2) fabrication techniques to prepare cathode layers, and (3) strategies to address segregation and poisoning issues.
Titulo: Recent progress in design and fabrication of SOFC cathodes for efficient catalytic oxygen reduction
